compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/home/ubuntu/data_ingestion_project/gene.serviceRawFile:
org: ${env:ORG_NAME}
service: dynamodb-setup

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: python3.9
  iam:
    role: ${env:ROLE_ARN}
  memorySize: 1024
  timeout: 30
  environment:
    STAGE: ${sls:stage}

resources:
  Resources:
    CommentsTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.STAGE}-hotel-comments
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: comment_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: room_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: user_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: created_at
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: comment_id
            KeyType: RANGE
        LocalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: tenant-room-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: room_id
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: user-date-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: user_id
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: created_at
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        PointInTimeRecoverySpecification:
          PointInTimeRecoveryEnabled: true

    HotelsTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.STAGE}-hotel-hotels
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: hotel_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: hotel_name
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: hotel_location
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: hotel_id
            KeyType: RANGE
        LocalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: tenant-name-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: hotel_name
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: hotel_location-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: hotel_location
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        PointInTimeRecoverySpecification:
          PointInTimeRecoveryEnabled: true

    PaymentsTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.STAGE}-hotel-payments
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: payment_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: user_id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: payment_id
            KeyType: RANGE
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        PointInTimeRecoverySpecification:
          PointInTimeRecoveryEnabled: true
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: user_id-tenant_id-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: user_id
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL

    ReservationsTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.STAGE}-hotel-reservations
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: reservation_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: start_date
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: user_id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: reservation_id
            KeyType: RANGE
        LocalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: tenant-start_date-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: start_date
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: user-start_date-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: user_id
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: start_date
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        PointInTimeRecoverySpecification:
          PointInTimeRecoveryEnabled: true

    RoomsTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.STAGE}-hotel-rooms
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: room_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: room_name
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: availability
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: room_id
            KeyType: RANGE
        LocalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: tenant-room_name-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: room_name
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: is_available-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: availability
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        PointInTimeRecoverySpecification:
          PointInTimeRecoveryEnabled: true

    ServicesTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.STAGE}-hotel-services
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: service_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: service_name
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: service_category
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: service_id
            KeyType: RANGE
        LocalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: tenant-service_name-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: service_name
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: category-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: service_category
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: service_id
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        PointInTimeRecoverySpecification:
          PointInTimeRecoveryEnabled: true

    UsersTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.STAGE}-hotel-users
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: user_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: email
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: user_id
            KeyType: RANGE
        LocalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: tenant-email-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: email
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: email-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: email
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        PointInTimeRecoverySpecification:
          PointInTimeRecoveryEnabled: true

    TokensTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.STAGE}-hotel-tokens
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: token
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: expiration
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: tenant_id
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: token
            KeyType: RANGE
        LocalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: tenant-expiration-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: expiration
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: token-index
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: token
                KeyType: HASH
              - AttributeName: tenant_id
                KeyType: RANGE
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        PointInTimeRecoverySpecification:
          PointInTimeRecoveryEnabled: true
